languages.text: "Я... еще никогда не развлекалась подобным образом". {n}Кассия бросает на вас полный надежды взгляд, а затем смущенно опускает ресницы.{/n} "Как жаль, что сейчас не время для домашних концертов. Кровавые сцены мне порядком наскучили — почти каждую высадку одно и то же".

"I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."
languages.original_text: "Я... еще никогда не развлекалась подобным образом". {n}Кассия бросает на вас полный надежды взгляд, а затем смущенно опускает ресницы.{/n} "Как жаль, что сейчас не время для домашних концертов. Кровавые сцены мне порядком наскучили — почти каждую высадку одно и то же".

traits.locale_text: "I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we make landing."

"I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we make landing."

"I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

"I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

"I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

languages.text: 「私は…私は今までそのような娯楽を楽しんだことはありませんでした」{n}カシアは希望に満ちた目を向け、それから恥ずかしそうに目を下げた。{/n}「サロンコンサートの時間がないのは非常に残念です。虐殺のシーンは十分に飽きましたーー大体いつも、どこかに降り立つたびに同じ光景です」
languages.original_text: "I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…私は今までそのような娯楽を楽しんだことはありませんでした」{n}カシアは希望に満ちた目を向け、それから恥ずかしそうに目を下げた。{/n}「サロンコンサートの時間がないのは非常に残念です。虐殺のシーンは十分に飽きましたーー大体いつも、どこかに降り立つたびに同じ光景です」

languages.text: « Je... je n'ai jamais assisté à un tel spectacle, {n}bredouille Cassia d'une voix pleine d'espoir avant de détourner les yeux timidement.{/n} Quel dommage que nous n'ayons pas le temps d'assister à des concerts de salon. Je suis un peu lasse des effusions de sang. Peu importe où nous nous rendons, c'est toujours le même spectacle. »
languages.original_text: "I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

traits.locale_text: « Je... je n'ai jamais assisté à un tel spectacle, {n}bredouille Cassia d'une voix pleine d'espoir avant de détourner les yeux timidement.{/n} Quel dommage que nous n'ayons pas le temps d'assister à des concerts de salon. Je suis un peu lasse des effusions de sang. Peu importe où nous nous rendons, c'est toujours le même spectacle. »

languages.text: “我……我从来没享受过这样的娱乐活动。”{n}卡西娅对你露出了期盼的眼神，随后腼腆地垂下眼帘。{/n}“我们没时间听音乐会，这实在是太可惜了。我已经厌倦了血腥的场面，无论我们到什么地方，几乎都是同样的遭遇。”
languages.original_text: "I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

traits.locale_text: “我……我从来没享受过这样的娱乐活动。”{n}卡西娅对你露出了期盼的眼神，随后腼腆地垂下眼帘。{/n}“我们没时间听音乐会，这实在是太可惜了。我已经厌倦了血腥的场面，无论我们到什么地方，几乎都是同样的遭遇。”

languages.text: «Es que... nunca he probado esa clase de divertimientos». {n}Cassia te dedica una mirada esperanzada y agacha la vista fugazmente.{/n} «Es una auténtica lástima que no tengamos tiempo para un concierto de cámara. Ya me harta tanta masacre; se repite la misma estampa siempre que ponemos un pie en algún lado».
languages.original_text: "I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

traits.locale_text: «Es que... nunca he probado esa clase de divertimientos». {n}Cassia te dedica una mirada esperanzada y agacha la vista fugazmente.{/n} «Es una auténtica lástima que no tengamos tiempo para un concierto de cámara. Ya me harta tanta masacre; se repite la misma estampa siempre que ponemos un pie en algún lado».

languages.text: "Ich ... Ich habe noch nie eine solche Unterhaltung genossen." {n}Cassia wirft dir einen hoffnungsvollen Blick vor und senkt dann verschämt den Blick.{/n} "Es ist ein solcher Jammer, dass wir keine Zeit für Salonkonzerte haben. Ich bin das Blutvergießen leid. Wohin wir auch kommen, es ist stets dasselbe Schauspiel."
languages.original_text: "I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... Ich habe noch nie eine solche Unterhaltung genossen." {n}Cassia wirft dir einen hoffnungsvollen Blick vor und senkt dann verschämt den Blick.{/n} "Es ist ein solcher Jammer, dass wir keine Zeit für Salonkonzerte haben. Ich bin das Blutvergießen leid. Wohin wir auch kommen, es ist stets dasselbe Schauspiel."

languages.text: "Ben... Daha önce hiç böyle eğlencelerde bulunmadım." {n}Cassia sana umut dolu bir bakış atıyor, ardından utanarak gözlerini yere indiriyor.{/n} "Salon konserlerine ayıracak zamanımızın olmaması pek yazık. Kan dökülen gösterilerden ise ziyadesiyle yoruldum, ne zaman yeni bir yere insek hep aynısı."
languages.original_text: "I... I have never enjoyed such entertainments before." {n}Cassia gives you a hopeful look, then casts her eyes down bashfully.{/n} "It is a terrible shame that we do not have time for parlour concerts. I grow quite tired of displays of bloodshed — it is the same scene practically every time we set down somewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Daha önce hiç böyle eğlencelerde bulunmadım." {n}Cassia sana umut dolu bir bakış atıyor, ardından utanarak gözlerini yere indiriyor.{/n} "Salon konserlerine ayıracak zamanımızın olmaması pek yazık. Kan dökülen gösterilerden ise ziyadesiyle yoruldum, ne zaman yeni bir yere insek hep aynısı."
